Sentencas: In addition to producing electrical energy alone, solid-oxide fuel cells (SOFC) can be operated with hydrocarbon fuel streams to produce synthesis gas (H-2 and CO) as well.

Sentencas: SOFC systems are usually operated to consume most of the fuel and produce electricity.

Sentencas: However, by operating with a hydrocarbon fuel at relatively high flow rates, the exhaust-gas composition can be predominantly syngas.

Sentencas: A practical limitation of electrochemical partial oxidation operation is the fact that carbon tends to deposit on Ni-based anode catalysts.

Sentencas: The present paper explores the use of barrier layers to prevent carbon deposits.
